metadata.synopsis: Struggling actress Alex (Helen Slater) is preparing to audition for a soap opera when she gets an offer to act as a weekend house sitter for Ronald (James Laurenson) and Sondra (Elyssa Davalos), who are eager to take a vacation after a neighbor's murder. Immersing herself in rehearsal, Alex pretends to be the mansion's owner. When termite exterminator Mickey (Michael Madsen) comes to the door, Alex lets him in -- but Mickey is not who he claims to be.
